props.name: title
props.description: The main title for the task within the task list component. If content is provided in the default slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: titleClass
props.description:
Classes to add to the title wrapper.
You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: href
props.description: The value of the link's `href` attribute for the task list item.

props.name: titleComponent
props.description: The component used to render the link, for example `RouterLink`.

props.name: hint
props.description: Can be used to add a hint to each task within the task list component. If content is provided in the `hint` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: status
props.description: Text to use for the status, as an alternative to using a tag. If content is provided in the `status` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: statusClass
props.description:
Classes to add to the status container.
You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: cannotStartYet
props.description: Set to `true` if the task cannot be started yet. This will make the status text grey.

slots.name: default
slots.description: The main title for the task within the task list component. If content is provided in this slot, the `title` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: hint
slots.description: The content of the hint. If content is provided in this slot, the `hint` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: status
slots.description: The content of the status, usually a `GvTag`. If content is provided in this slot, the `hint` prop will be ignored.
